name: To The Sun (t1az2z)
description:
Controls: 

Arrows/A,D - Move

Space/Up - Jump

After picking up    - you can use dash

LShift/RShift - Dash

Find and collect all 13 apples for extra chellenge!

NOTE:  Bare-bones demo of the game. The project is terminated, there are still some bugs and missing features, but there are no plans for future updates.

All artwork made by @konstruktor_art
